item.title: Convert HEIC to JPG in Ubuntu
item.description: Convert HEIC to JPG in Ubuntu Sometimes I have to share files to an old Android device which is not powerful enough to handle jpg so I follow these steps to convert HEIC to JPG Install dependencies This will install package we need to convert images sudo apt install libheif-examples Convert images The following command will convert all images in current folder for file in *.heic do heif-convert $file ${file/%.heic/.jpg} done
